cause.description:
To raise money, donate it to orphanages.Also to go and actually spend time with children having a rough childhood. Try help in any way you can to make their lives easier and happier. Because its a persons childhood which can make or break a person, so please guys, lets help create a better future for the children in need.
1. child abuse MUST stop.
2. ALL children deserve a decent childhood.
3. all children must feel loved!!
cause.mission: Help orphans to have a better childhood and greater hope and dreams for their futures.
cause.name: Save The Orphans
